This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailscoming out from the grocery store i was admiring the awsome sun setting sky, still bright daylight with pink cloud formations, i noticed a commercial airliner crossing east to west with the setting sun making it glow, i then observed off to the far left of the sky an object that was much more dull in appearance, no strobing or colored lights flying in a flat trajectory from the north to the south it was about the same size as the airliner i had observed earlier but it had no visable wings or such and appeared to be jusy a cylinder, as it got closer i noticed two large round spot light type lights on its right side, the side facing me, it looked much larger as it was now quite close, it then went into a Cloud and did not emerge, what bothered me was its very close proximity to normal aircraft flying by, the cloud formation the object went into had a very unusual shape, the best way i can describe it is, it was like a giant football, with an eye in the center almost like a tornado cloud, Photo Attached, althought the object was fully visable i could not identify it and so it remains unidentified, i posted it on here in case any one else had seen it as well, this is the third time i have noticed such an object in the same area, next time i will have my camera with me.
Summary: Observed what appeared to be a large chrome cylinder with two bright lights on its right side, no strobes
